game_engine

Class Render

  • java.lang.Object
    • game_engine.Render

  • public class Render
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles all type of rendering on the screen.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Render(GameLoop gc)
      The render constructor, initializes all arrays and variables.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clear()
      Makes sure the screen is clean.
      void drawFillRect(int offX, int offY, int width, int height, int color)
      Draws a filled rectangle on the screen, specify a color with 0xff followed by any hexadecimal color in RGB.
      void drawImage(Image image, int offX, int offY)
      Draws an image on screen
      void drawImageTile(ImageTile image, int offX, int offY, int tileX, int tileY)
      Draws an imagetile on screen.
      void drawLight(Light l, int offX, int offY) 
      void drawRect(int offX, int offY, int width, int height, int color)
      Draws a non filled rectangle on the screen, specify a color with 0xff followed by any RGB color in hexadecimal.
      void drawText(java.lang.String text, int offX, int offY, int color)
      Draws text on the screen.
      int getAmbientColor() 
      int getzDepth() 
      void process()
      Handles image and lightprocessing to render correctly and in the right order.
      void setAmbientColor(int ambientColor) 
      void setLightBlock(int x, int y, int value)
      Handles which images block the light depending on zDepth.
      void setLightMap(int x, int y, int value)
      Handles the lightmap with all the lights in.
      void setPixel(int x, int y, int value)
      Assigns the image pixels to an array and makes transparent for certain value
      void setzDepth(int zDepth)
